    • Constructor Detail

      • MathExpression

        public MathExpression(MathExpression.Operation operation,
                      java.lang.Object operand1,
                      java.lang.Object operand2)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a new Expression
        Parameters:
        operation -
        operand1 - (String,BigDecimal or Expression)
        var2 - (String,BigDecimal or Expression)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Note: String: The String will be used as variable getting the value from the values map. BigDecimal: The operand will be used in the operation with no replacements. MathExpression: The code will call to the result() method of the operand passing as arguments the current variables values using the result value as operand in the the operation.
